description: This Dart source file defines the Staff class and the StaffRole enum used in the kindergarten management system frontend. The Staff class models a staff member with attributes such as name, contact information, role, department, hire date, and status, including methods for serialization and copying.

classes.name: Staff
classes.description: Represents a staff member in the kindergarten system, including personal details, role, and employment information.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts a Staff instance to a Map<String, dynamic> for serialization.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Staff instance from a Map<String, dynamic>, parsing fields appropriately.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Staff instance with optional modified fields.

methods.name: fullName
methods.description: Returns the full name of the staff member by concatenating first and last names.

methods.name: roleDisplayName
methods.description: Returns the display name of the role in uppercase.
